On Fri, Jul 30, 2010 at 4:45 AM, Suresh <sureshkk@...> wrote:
> Any thoughts??

Understanding and applying REST correctly is hard, many people fail at both.

Coupling client and server can be used as a way to increase customer retention.

Cheers,
Mike
